pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["本目录是 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"influxdb"}]," ， ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"telegraf"}]," 等时序型数据库的相关组件的镜像软件源。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"debian--ubuntu-用户","children":"Debian / Ubuntu 用户"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["首先信任来自 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://docs.influxdata.com/telegraf/v1.18/introduction/installation/","rel":"nofollow","children":"influxdata"}]," 的 PGP 公钥："]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","em",null,{"children":["注：Influxdata 在 2023-01-26 使用了新的 GPG 密钥，详情可参考",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.influxdata.com/blog/linux-package-signing-key-rotation/","rel":"nofollow","children":"此处"}]]}]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"wget -q https://repos.influxdata.com/influxdata-archive_compat.key
cat influxdata-archive_compat.key | {{sudo}}gpg --dearmor -o /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/influxdata-archive_compat.gpg","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["将下方文本框中的内容写入 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/influxdata.list"}]]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/apt/sources.list.d/influxdata.list","code":"deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/debian/ stable main","codeLanguage":"properties"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"即可安装相关软件，如："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}apt install influxdb","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"centos--redhat-用户","children":"CentOS / RedHat 用户"}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"tunabfsunju-等","children":"TUNA/BFSU/NJU 等"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["新建 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/yum.repos.d/influxdata.repo"}],"，内容为"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/yum.repos.d/influxdata.repo","menus":[{"title":"发行版","items":[["CentOS/RHEL 7 (x86_64)",{"release_name":"el7-x86_64"}]]}],"code":"[influxdata]
name = InfluxData Repository - RHEL $releasever
baseurl={{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/yum/{{release_name}}
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://repos.influxdata.com/influxdata-archive_compat.key","codeLanguage":"ini"}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"ustc","children":"USTC"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["新建 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/yum.repos.d/influxdata.repo"}],"，内容为"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"enableQuickSetup":true,"filepath":"/etc/yum.repos.d/influxdata.repo","code":"[influxdata]
name = InfluxData Repository - Stable
baseurl = {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/stable/$basearch/main
enabled = 1
gpgcheck = 1
gpgkey = https://repos.influxdata.com/influxdata-archive_compat.key","codeLanguage":"ini"}],"
",["$r","h4",null,{"id":"共有部分","children":"共有部分"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"再执行"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}yum makecache","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"即可安装相关软件，如："}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}yum install influxdb","codeLanguage":"bash"}]]}]

meta.title: Influxdata 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
